response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed with exceptional quality and functionality in mind. It's not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your daily experience. Considering its unique features and benefits, I believe it's worth more than its face value. For this opportunity, I am offering it to you for $150. This price reflects its true value and the effort put into creating it. I trust that you will find it to be a worthwhile investment. Let me know if you have any questions or need further information about the product.", "product_price": 150}
